document_data.name: ''Tranquil Bolt''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Tranquil bolts''''' were a type of [[enchanted]] [[crossbow]] ammunition especially effective against spellcasters.
document_data.Powers: ''Tranquil bolts'' were enhanced with a simple ''+1'' enchantment that increased the damage and guided the bolts towards their targets. Each bolt unleashed the ''[[silence]]'' [[spell]] after piercing its target.
document_data.History: Some years before the {{YearlinkName|1312}}, the infamous [[Band of the Key]] and its leader [[Heglyf]], commissioned the creation of brightly-decorated enchanted ''tranquil bolts'' from [[Deneir]]ian [[priest]]s. These bolts are created in large batches to aid the adventurers in their hunt for occultist.
